WE HAVE A BIRTHDAY IN THE AUDIENCE THIS EVENING                         TODAY IS THE BIRTHDAY OF @B1F @B1L         LET US ALL SPEAK HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO @B1F                  NO SINGING PLEASE          JUST SPEAK IT         READY GO      HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU          HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU          HAPPY BIRTHDAY DEAR @B1F           HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU:WE HAVE A COUPLE OF BIRTHDAYS IN THE AUDIENCE THIS EVENING            TODAY IS THE BIRTHDAY OF *B1F *B1L AND *B2F *B2L            LET US ALL SPEAK HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO *B1F AND *B2F      NO SINGING PLEASE         JUST SPEAK IT         READY GO         HAPPY BIRTHDAY  TO YOU              HAPPY BIRTHDAY  TO YOU              HAPPY BIRTHDAY DEAR *B1F AND *B2F              HAPPY BIRTHDAY  TO YOU:WE HAVE A FEW BIRTHDAYS IN THE AUDIENCE THIS EVENING            TODAY IS THE BIRTHDAY OF *B1F *B1L, *B2F *B2L, AND *B3F *B3L            LET US ALL SPEAK HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO *B1F, *B2F AND *B3F      NO SINGING PLEASE         JUST SPEAK IT         READY GO         HAPPY BIRTHDAY  TO YOU              HAPPY BIRTHDAY  TO YOU              HAPPY BIRTHDAY DEAR *B1F, *B2F AND *B3F               HAPPY BIRTHDAY  TO YOU
